description.en:
In the early beginning of 2021, Hamtaro was created. After a few ups and downs, the creator decided they would abandon the contract as a whole.

In April of 2021, a holder saw that something was left with Hamtaro. Building a community from a few hundred members to 24k holders, Hamtaro grew at an extraordinary rate! After hitting multiple ATH, the ‘leader’ had decided to leave. Thus, leading us to now…

The issue with a single leader or owner is simple, heavy is the head that wears the crown. If Hamtaro is to become the HUGE community we all dream of, we’ll need everyone to help hold it up! Thus, giving you a say in our future and the birth of ‘The Hamtaro Committee’. We are a group of Hamtaro holders that have assorted skills in project management, backend development, and marketing. Through the creation of polls, surveys, and AMAs, your wish is our command.

We are Hamtaro!
